entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
